page.title: 13SUMMER FAIR LOWER HEATH
page.content: On 13th of July 1985 we held a {Nostalgia Fair}at Lower Heath C.E School.The money from the fair{(Â£857) went to{school}funds.They had a lot of small games;Guess the dolls birthday, Find the lucky brick, Guess the Teddy Bears name,How many currants in the cake and How many sweets in the jar.The adults ran the bigger stalls. Heres a list of the stalls,Cakes and Groceries,{Handicraft,}white Elephant, Toys,Quoits, Ski-ball, Skittles,Box Bowls, Darts,Bran Tub,Lucky football, Balloons,flowers,Ducks,Icecream,crisps & pop and refreshments.There were pony rides(20p) and Pony trap rides(25p).In side the school there were exhibitions of{bee-keeping, patchwork, knitting, {live chicks, sweet-making,corn-dolly {making}and an exhibition of old {photographs and documents}about the school which was very popular.
